reviews.text: PROS: this place is the only record stores in the town. Their selection is amazing, their lounge is great, and the prices are good CONS: the guy at the counter was grouchy and very introverted when we came inOVERALL: I don't think the hospitality was good but if you're just looking for a record than this is the spot to come to

My son bought 4 cassettes from Sweet Repeat Records. I tried to look through the vinyl records but the store smelled of cigarettes and the smoke smell was so strong that I had to go outside and wait until my son was through shopping. I'm normally one who wants to flip through all the records in hopes to find that album I have been searching for but this wasn't the place for me.
The records in this place are good and i think the most interesting is that they were made in a very different time frame and they are all in a very unique time period.

Friend of mine saw a record there for the soundtrack of my favorite move - "Summer of '42".  Friend couldn't make it back to pick it up, so the owner shipped it to us - for free, even after we offered to pay by venmo!  What an amazing person and what an amazing record store.  I could not have found that vinyl record anywhere.  5 stars!
Awesome little place with good prices and selection. Def stop in and take a look. Hope to visit again.
It was so cute! Great customer service, very kind and patient. Amazing music.
